about.en: System Engineer with 10+ years of hands-on experience in multidisciplinary HW/SW development, system bring-up, high-speed board integration, lab validation, power delivery optimization, and cross-team debugging. Proven technical leadership across complex hardware platforms including LiDAR, radar, and high-bandwidth digital systems. Strong ownership mindset, deep understanding of system architecture, and extensive lab, measurement, and verification experience.
